input_args.text:
'News Bulletin Shea Weber #6 of the Montreal Canadiens celebrates the game winning powerplay goal at 17:03 of the third period against the New York Islanders and is joined by Jeff Petry #26 at the Barclays Center on October 26, 2016 in the Brooklyn borough of New York City. (AFP) 
The Montreal Canadiens edged past the New York Islanders 3-2 on Wednesday night. 
Montreal took a 2-1 lead early in the third period on a goal by Phillip Danault. But it didn’t take long for Dennis Seidenberg level things up for the Islanders. 
However, with just less than three minutes to play, Shea Weber scored his 3rd of the season on a power play to give Montreal the 3-2 victory.'
